title: Get 22% OFF with the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Plus!
description: The Galaxy Tab A9+ is currently on sale at the moment, with up to $60 off its usual retail price. The post Get 22% OFF with the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Plus! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: The Galaxy Tab A9+ is currently on sale at the moment, with up to $60 off its usual retail price.
text: Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S-series tablets are ideal devices if you’re searching for a high-end tablet experience, although it should be said that the company’s more affordable A-series Galaxy Tabs are undoubtedly a more practical alternative, especially if all you’re after are the essentials. As such, the Galaxy Tab A9+ is currently on sale at the moment, with up to $60 off its usual retail price. In terms of specs and features, the Tab A9+ features an 11-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 1920 x 1200 pixel resolution, making it ideal for web browsing, social media apps, and content streaming. The tablet is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 processor aided by up to 128GB of expandable storage, all wrapped up in a sleek body with a metal chassis. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S-series tablets are ideal devices if you’re searching for a high-end tablet experience, although it should be said that the company’s more affordable A-series Galaxy Tabs are undoubtedly a more practical alternative, especially if all you’re after are the essentials. As such, the Galaxy Tab A9+ is currently on sale at the moment, with up to $60 off its usual retail price.

In terms of specs and features, the Tab A9+ features an 11-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 1920 x 1200 pixel resolution, making it ideal for web browsing, social media apps, and content streaming. The tablet is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 processor aided by up to 128GB of expandable storage, all wrapped up in a sleek body with a metal chassis. You can check it out using the link below.
